column1: The family will receive friends on Tuesday
column3: 2015 from 5:00 P.M. to 6:45 P.M. at Oakley-Cook Funeral Home in Bristol
column4: Tennessee. The funeral service will follow at 7:00 P.M. The committal and interment will be held on Wednesday
column7: Tennessee. Military Rites will be provided by the Bristol V.F.W. Honor Guard Post #6975.
